package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: Gperf hash function generator
package-manager.description: Gperf is a perfect hash function generator written in C++. Simply stated, a perfect hash function is a hash function and a data structure that allows recognition of a key word in a set of words using exactly one probe into the data structure.
